title: What are examples of music types? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are three websites I would like to recommend to quickly get examples of music genres: Every Noise at Once: Contain lots and lots of music genres, each one with an example.Musicmap | The Genealogy and History of Popular Music Genres: This website tells the history of each genre and its predecessors, with YouTube playlists of each genre.Ishkur's Guide to Electronic Music: If you like electronic music, the classic Ishkur’s Guide have up to 5 examples per electronic music genre, telling its story and description (heavily opinionated, take it with a grain of salt).

Jazz : Kenny G.. Hard Rock : Linkin Park Electronic : Alan Walker Rock : Audio Slaves Pop: Backstreet Boys Indie Rock : Kaleo Soft Rock and Pop : Enrique Classic and Pop : Adele Blues : I think Bob Marley… and the list goes on and on………… :-)
